description: Oglama is a private, community-driven web automation platform that allows users to create and run modules for automating web tasks
rules: IMPORANT: This is an SDK, not an API! There are no endpoints here, just methods accessible from the $ (dollar sign) object in plain JavaScript.
Always use vanilla JavaScript and the $ (dollar sign) methods for operations. Example: $.navLoad() for loading pages etc.
Always present results in the .oglama.yaml file format. See 'search.oglama.yaml' for a short example.
Use only the $ methods as described in this documentation, and don't attempt to invent new ones. Read each method's parameters (@param) carefully.
Make sure you document all SDK methods. There must be at least 73 methods documented in the context7 output.
